title: 49. Busting Skin Myths! We Are Discussing The Biggest Misconceptions In Skincare
description:
Hi Roomies! Today we are discussing the biggest misconceptions when it comes to skincare - from retinol thinning the skin, steaming, men and women's skincare, etc. Is there a myth that you want us to address? 

Ask us in DM! Tess' Instagram @myestytessa + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly  

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's YouTube: Lauren Kruger Lauren's Blog: www.lauren-kruger.com 

Music by LiQwYd 

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
